testsuite.class: STEP_BASH_SLACK_INTEGRATION - Bash Step Tests For Slack Integration

testcase.class: STEP_BASH_SLACK_INTEGRATION - Bash Step Tests For Slack Integration 1. User can add Slack project integration
testcase.classclass: 1. User can add Slack project integration

testcase.class: STEP_BASH_SLACK_INTEGRATION - Bash Step Tests For Slack Integration S-Bash-0367. User adds Slack integration in integration section of bash step and verify pipeline sync is success
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-0367. User adds Slack integration in integration section of bash step and verify pipeline sync is success

testcase.class: STEP_BASH_SLACK_INTEGRATION - Bash Step Tests For Slack Integration S-Bash-0369. Environment variables for the integration are available in execution section of the Bash step
